key_changes: Implemented main validateOlimpusConfig function to orchestrate all validation checks

patterns_discovered: Sequential validation pattern - validates in order: circular dependencies → agent references → regex performance
Context-driven validation approach with optional checks controlled by validation context
Separation of concerns - different validation functions for different concerns
Error aggregation pattern - all errors collected and final validity determined by error count
gotchas_discovered: Regex performance check generates warnings only, not errors (line 326)
Validation order matters - circular dependencies checked first, potentially preventing later validation issues
Context options allow disabling specific validation checks when not needed

approach_outcome.approach: Implementation of main orchestrator function that coordinates existing validation functions
approach_outcome.completeness: Complete - main validation function now fully integrates all validation components
approach_outcome.impact: Enables comprehensive configuration validation with control over which checks to perform

recommendations: Consider adding validation timeout for large configurations to prevent long-running validation
Document the validation order and explain why it matters for users
Consider adding metrics/performance tracking for validation execution time
Add unit tests specifically for the orchestrator function's integration points
